Discord Minigames - Please Read Carefully

üìã Agreement to Terms

By accessing and using Discord Minigames ("the Service," "we," "our," or "us"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

üéÆ What We Are

Discord Minigames is a collection of interactive games that integrate with Discord, including Circus games, Battle AI simulations, and other minigames designed to enhance your Discord server experience.

üë• Eligibility & Account Requirements

Age Requirements

  • You must be at least 13 years old to use our Service
  • If you are under 18, you must have parental or guardian consent
  • We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13

Discord Account

  • You must have a valid Discord account to access our Service
  • You are responsible for maintaining the security of your Discord account
  • You must comply with Discord's own Terms of Service

Server Access

  • Our Service must be added to Discord servers by authorized administrators
  • You must have permission to use our Service in the Discord server
  • Server administrators control how our Service is configured and used

üéØ Acceptable Use Policy

What You Can Do

  • Play games and participate in competitions fairly
  • Create and customize characters within game parameters
  • Interact with other players in a respectful manner
  • Use the Service for entertainment and community building

What You Cannot Do

  • Cheating: Use exploits, bots, or unauthorized modifications
  • Harassment: Bully, threaten, or abuse other users
  • Spam: Flood channels with excessive messages or content
  • Impersonation: Pretend to be someone else or our staff
  • Illegal Content: Share content that violates laws or Discord's policies
  • Reverse Engineering: Attempt to decompile or modify our code

‚ö†Ô∏è Zero Tolerance Policy

We have a zero-tolerance policy for harassment, hate speech, or any form of abuse. Violations will result in immediate account suspension or termination.

üéÆ Game Rules & Fair Play

General Game Rules

  • Play games fairly and respect other players
  • Do not exploit bugs or glitches for unfair advantage
  • Report any technical issues or suspicious behavior
  • Accept wins and losses with good sportsmanship

Battle AI Specific Rules

  • Character names must be appropriate and non-offensive
  • Character descriptions must not contain harmful content
  • Do not create characters that impersonate real people
  • Respect the cooldown system and battle gem mechanics

Circus Game Rules

  • Play the game as intended without external assistance
  • Do not use automated tools or scripts
  • Report any scoring anomalies or bugs
  • Compete fairly for high scores and achievements

üîó Discord Integration Terms

üì¢ Automatic Posting

Our Service automatically posts certain information to Discord channels, including:

  • Game results and achievements
  • Character creations and battle summaries
  • High scores and leaderboards
  • Battle gem transactions

Your Consent

  • By using our Service, you consent to this automatic posting
  • Information posted becomes visible to all Discord server members
  • You can control some aspects through Discord privacy settings
  • Contact server administrators to limit what gets posted

Discord's Terms

  • Our Service operates within Discord's platform and policies
  • Discord's own Terms of Service apply to your use of their platform
  • We are not responsible for Discord's actions or policy changes
  • Discord may modify or restrict our Service's functionality

üíé Virtual Currency & Items

Battle Gems

  • Battle gems are virtual currency with no real-world value
  • Gems are earned through gameplay and cannot be purchased
  • Maximum gem capacity is limited to 5 gems per user
  • Gems are non-transferable between users

Character Ownership

  • Characters you create belong to your account
  • Characters cannot be sold, traded, or transferred
  • We reserve the right to modify or remove characters if needed
  • Character data is stored on our servers and subject to our policies

No Real Money Transactions

  • Our Service is completely free to use
  • No real money is required or accepted
  • Virtual items have no cash value
  • We do not offer refunds for virtual currency or items

üõ°Ô∏è User Content & Intellectual Property

Your Content

  • You retain ownership of character names and descriptions you create
  • You grant us a license to use your content to provide the Service
  • You are responsible for ensuring your content doesn't violate rights
  • We may remove content that violates our policies

Our Intellectual Property

  • Our games, code, and designs are protected by copyright
  • You may not copy, modify, or distribute our intellectual property
  • Our trademarks and branding are our exclusive property
  • Third-party assets (Discord, Google AI) have their own protections

AI-Generated Content

  • Battle narratives are generated using Google's Generative AI
  • AI-generated content is subject to Google's terms and policies
  • We do not claim ownership of AI-generated content
  • AI content may be filtered or modified for appropriateness

üìä Data & Privacy

Data Collection

  • We collect game data, character information, and usage statistics
  • Discord integration data is handled according to Discord's policies
  • We use Google AI services for enhanced gameplay features
  • Data is stored securely and used only to provide our Service

Privacy Policy

  • Our Privacy Policy explains how we handle your data
  • By using our Service, you agree to our Privacy Policy
  • We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time
  • Continued use constitutes acceptance of updated policies

Data Retention

  • Game data is retained while your account is active
  • You may request deletion of your data at any time
  • Some data may be retained for legal or security purposes
  • Data deletion requests are processed within 30 days

üö´ Prohibited Activities

Technical Violations

  • Attempting to hack, exploit, or gain unauthorized access
  • Using automated tools, bots, or scripts
  • Interfering with our servers or infrastructure
  • Attempting to reverse engineer our code or systems

Content Violations

  • Sharing inappropriate, offensive, or harmful content
  • Creating characters that impersonate real people
  • Using hate speech, threats, or harassment
  • Sharing personal information of others

Behavioral Violations

  • Griefing or intentionally ruining others' experiences
  • Spamming or flooding channels with content
  • Organizing or participating in coordinated abuse
  • Attempting to manipulate leaderboards or scores

‚öñÔ∏è Consequences & Enforcement

Warning System

  • First violations typically result in warnings
  • Repeated violations lead to temporary suspensions
  • Serious violations may result in permanent bans
  • We reserve the right to skip warnings for severe violations

Appeal Process

  • You may appeal enforcement actions within 30 days
  • Appeals should include relevant evidence and context
  • We review appeals fairly and respond within 14 days
  • Final decisions are at our sole discretion

Account Termination

  • We may terminate accounts for serious or repeated violations
  • Terminated accounts lose access to all game data
  • Character data and progress may be permanently deleted
  • We are not obligated to restore terminated accounts

Service Availability

Updates & Changes

  • We may discontinue features or games with notice

Third-Party Dependencies

  • Third-party policy changes may affect our Service
  • We will work to minimize impact of external issues
